Diary of Lydia:

.................................................. .....................................she is dead. Only I am here and she is dead. Who is she? I'm here. Who am I? She's in the castle. Who is she? We had a deal. What deal? Who is he? I said I will do it. Do what? I lost it. Lost what? I got it. I was getting what? Who is she?
I said I should do it. Do what? I lost it. What? I got it. Got what?
